artist: Artist: Richard Earlom; Artist: after Claude Gellée (called Le Lorrain)
creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: man on horseback with sword raised at center; dragon belo w horseman; fleeing figures at L; trees at L and R
inscription: Inscription, bottom edge in the plate: [Claude le Lorrain delint./ No. 73./ Published Novr. 1st 1774 by John Boydell Engraver in Cheapside./ From the Original drawing, in the Collection of the Duke of Devonshire./ R. Earlom fecit.]
title: Plate No. 73 from "Liber Veritatis"
